text: My Neighbors the Yamadas () is a 1999 Japanese animated comedy movie written and directed by Isao Takahata and produced by Studio Ghibli. Category:1999 animated movies Category:1999 comedy movies Category:Fictional families Category:Japanese animated movies Category:Japanese comedy movies Category:Japanese-language movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies based on comics Category:Studio Ghibli
title: My Neighbors the Yamadas
